openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: popwaifu API
  version: 0.0.1
servers:
  - url: /api
  - url: "https://popwaifu.click/api"
paths:
  /:
    $ref: ./root.yaml
  # pop
  /v1/pop/record:
    $ref: ./pop/record.yaml
  # waifu
  /v1/waifu/list:
    $ref: ./waifu/list.yaml
  /v1/waifu/list/popcount:
    $ref: ./waifu/list/popcount.yaml
